page.title: 02Shudy Camps Village
page.content: Shudy Camps is a little smaller than Castle Camps. There is only one post office. There is not much traffic. There are two T juntions in Main Street.There is also one up beside the church. There are no pubs. There used to be one pub in Main Street called the Three Horse Shoes.Where the old vicarage is there used to be a school. There are three farms in Shudy Camps.They are called Carters Farm, Lower Farm and Lord ship Farm.There is nowhere to play, only a meadow which belongs to Mr Kiddy.Most of the fields grow wheat and some have cows in them.There is a private park with three cottages with it.The nearest shopping centre is in Haverhill.There are quite a few footpaths.
